html:
7.5.20  7:23 am   Judging by some of your previous answers, there are certain "phases" during this whole graphics-department-reinvention. Like, when you talked about LOD, bpy and so forth. But recently, I couldn't find any hints on what you're doing now. Could you give us a tiny, little hint?

sure
embedded answer: https://billwurtz.com/questions/ui1173evt6ttzja.html


frompoiseob=bpy.data.objects[frompoise]
topoiseob=bpy.data.objects[topoise]

print("frompoise="+str(frompoise))
print("topoise="+str(topoise))
fromparts=[]
toparts=[]
frombits=[]
tobits=[]
print("frompoiseob="+str(frompoiseob))
print("topoiseob="+str(topoiseob))


for poise in [frompoise, topoise]:
poisob=bpy.data.objects[poise]
bits=[]
parts=[]
for ob in bpy.data.objects:
  #if ob.hide_viewport==False:
   if ob.constraints!=None:
    for con in ob.constraints:
     if con.type=='COPY_TRANSFORMS':
      if ob.animation_data!=None:
       for driver in ob.animation_data.drivers:
        for var in driver.driver.variables:
         for target in var.targets:
          if target.id==poisob:
           #print("target.id.name="+str(target.id.name))
           #print("poise="+str(poise))
           datapath=driver.data_path
           #print("datapath="+str(datapath))
           if datapath.endswith('influence')==True:
            
            exec("bit=ob."+(str(datapath)[:-10])+".target")
            exec("conzo=ob."+(str(datapath)[:-10]))

           if bit not in bits:
            bits.append(bit)

           if ob not in parts:
            parts.append(ob)
            
if poise==frompoise:
  frombits=bits
  fromparts=parts
elif poise==topoise:
  toparts=parts
  tobits=bits  

print("frompoise="+str(frompoise))
print("topoise="+str(topoise))
print("fromparts="+str(fromparts))
print("toparts="+str(toparts))
print("frombits="+str(frombits))
print("tobits="+str(tobits))

ufromparts=fromparts
ufrombits=frombits
utoparts=[]
utobits=[]


if selectmethod=='all':
ufromparts=fromparts
ufrombits=frombits

for frompart in fromparts:
  if frompart in toparts and frompart not in utoparts:
   utoparts.append(frompart)
for frombit in frombits:
  if frombit in tobits and frombit not in utobits:
   utobits.append(frombit)
elif selectmethod=='custom':
for frompart in fromparts:
  if frompart in bpy.context.selected_objects and frompart not in ufromparts:
   ufromparts.append(fromparts)
#print('YES, ITS CUSTOM')
print("toparts="+str(toparts))
for part in toparts:
  if part in bpy.context.selected_objects:
   utoparts.append(part)
ufrombits=[]
for frombit in frombits:
  for ob in ufromparts:
    #if ob.hide_viewport==False:
     #print("MESSUP OB="+str(ob))
     if ob.constraints!=None:
      for con in ob.constraints:
       if con.type=='COPY_TRANSFORMS':
        if ob.animation_data!=None:
         for driver in ob.animation_data.drivers:
          for var in driver.driver.variables:
           for target in var.targets:
            if target.id==frompoiseob:
             #print("target.id.name="+str(target.id.name))
             #print("poise="+str(poise))
             datapath=driver.data_path
             #print("datapath="+str(datapath))
             if datapath.endswith('influence')==True:

               exec("ufrombit=ob."+(str(datapath)[:-10])+".target")

               exec("conzo=ob."+(str(datapath)[:-10]))
             #print("UFROMBIT="+str(ufrombit))
             if ufrombit==frombit and ufrombit not in ufrombits:
              ufrombits.append(ufrombit)

utobits=[]
print("UTOPARTS="+str(utoparts))
for ob in utoparts:   
   #if ob.hide_viewport==False:
    #print("MESSUP OB="+str(ob))
    if ob.constraints!=None:
     for con in ob.constraints:
      if con.type=='COPY_TRANSFORMS':
       if ob.animation_data!=None:
        for driver in ob.animation_data.drivers:
         for var in driver.driver.variables:
          for target in var.targets:
           if target.id==topoiseob:
            #print("target.id.name="+str(target.id.name))
            #print("poise="+str(poise))
            datapath=driver.data_path
            #print("datapath="+str(datapath))
            if datapath.endswith('influence')==True:
             
             exec("ubit=ob."+(str(datapath)[:-10])+".target")
             exec("conzo=ob."+(str(datapath)[:-10]))
            #print("UBIT="+str(ubit))
            if ubit not in utobits:
             utobits.append(ubit)





print("ufromparts="+str(ufromparts))
print("ufrombits="+str(ufrombits))
print("utoparts="+str(utoparts))
print("utobits="+str(utobits))

n=-1
for bit in utobits:
n=n+1
print("bloc="+str(bit))
print("uloc="+str(ufrombits[n]))
print("bloc="+str(bit.location))

print("uloc"+str(ufrombits[n].location))
bit.location=ufrombits[n].location
bit.rotation_euler=ufrombits[n].rotation_euler

sure

answers_original.html:
frompoiseob=bpy.data.objects[frompoise]
topoiseob=bpy.data.objects[topoise]

print("frompoise="+str(frompoise))
print("topoise="+str(topoise))
fromparts=[]
toparts=[]
frombits=[]
tobits=[]
print("frompoiseob="+str(frompoiseob))
print("topoiseob="+str(topoiseob))


for poise in [frompoise, topoise]:
poisob=bpy.data.objects[poise]
bits=[]
parts=[]
for ob in bpy.data.objects:
  #if ob.hide_viewport==False:
   if ob.constraints!=None:
    for con in ob.constraints:
     if con.type=='COPY_TRANSFORMS':
      if ob.animation_data!=None:
       for driver in ob.animation_data.drivers:
        for var in driver.driver.variables:
         for target in var.targets:
          if target.id==poisob:
           #print("target.id.name="+str(target.id.name))
           #print("poise="+str(poise))
           datapath=driver.data_path
           #print("datapath="+str(datapath))
           if datapath.endswith('influence')==True:
            
            exec("bit=ob."+(str(datapath)[:-10])+".target")
            exec("conzo=ob."+(str(datapath)[:-10]))

           if bit not in bits:
            bits.append(bit)

           if ob not in parts:
            parts.append(ob)
            
if poise==frompoise:
  frombits=bits
  fromparts=parts
elif poise==topoise:
  toparts=parts
  tobits=bits  

print("frompoise="+str(frompoise))
print("topoise="+str(topoise))
print("fromparts="+str(fromparts))
print("toparts="+str(toparts))
print("frombits="+str(frombits))
print("tobits="+str(tobits))

ufromparts=fromparts
ufrombits=frombits
utoparts=[]
utobits=[]


if selectmethod=='all':
ufromparts=fromparts
ufrombits=frombits

for frompart in fromparts:
  if frompart in toparts and frompart not in utoparts:
   utoparts.append(frompart)
for frombit in frombits:
  if frombit in tobits and frombit not in utobits:
   utobits.append(frombit)
elif selectmethod=='custom':
for frompart in fromparts:
  if frompart in bpy.context.selected_objects and frompart not in ufromparts:
   ufromparts.append(fromparts)
#print('YES, ITS CUSTOM')
print("toparts="+str(toparts))
for part in toparts:
  if part in bpy.context.selected_objects:
   utoparts.append(part)
ufrombits=[]
for frombit in frombits:
  for ob in ufromparts:
    #if ob.hide_viewport==False:
     #print("MESSUP OB="+str(ob))
     if ob.constraints!=None:
      for con in ob.constraints:
       if con.type=='COPY_TRANSFORMS':
        if ob.animation_data!=None:
         for driver in ob.animation_data.drivers:
          for var in driver.driver.variables:
           for target in var.targets:
            if target.id==frompoiseob:
             #print("target.id.name="+str(target.id.name))
             #print("poise="+str(poise))
             datapath=driver.data_path
             #print("datapath="+str(datapath))
             if datapath.endswith('influence')==True:

               exec("ufrombit=ob."+(str(datapath)[:-10])+".target")

               exec("conzo=ob."+(str(datapath)[:-10]))
             #print("UFROMBIT="+str(ufrombit))
             if ufrombit==frombit and ufrombit not in ufrombits:
              ufrombits.append(ufrombit)

utobits=[]
print("UTOPARTS="+str(utoparts))
for ob in utoparts:   
   #if ob.hide_viewport==False:
    #print("MESSUP OB="+str(ob))
    if ob.constraints!=None:
     for con in ob.constraints:
      if con.type=='COPY_TRANSFORMS':
       if ob.animation_data!=None:
        for driver in ob.animation_data.drivers:
         for var in driver.driver.variables:
          for target in var.targets:
           if target.id==topoiseob:
            #print("target.id.name="+str(target.id.name))
            #print("poise="+str(poise))
            datapath=driver.data_path
            #print("datapath="+str(datapath))
            if datapath.endswith('influence')==True:
             
             exec("ubit=ob."+(str(datapath)[:-10])+".target")
             exec("conzo=ob."+(str(datapath)[:-10]))
            #print("UBIT="+str(ubit))
            if ubit not in utobits:
             utobits.append(ubit)





print("ufromparts="+str(ufromparts))
print("ufrombits="+str(ufrombits))
print("utoparts="+str(utoparts))
print("utobits="+str(utobits))

n=-1
for bit in utobits:
